comments.author: EmpoEX
comments.body: You can try Hackforums.net, Nulled.to, cracked.to, and many more.Make sure you are dealing with a reputed person and using a reputed Middle man.

comments.author: GH2022
comments.body: Quote from: Crydeal on June 25, 2023, 09:39:26 AMApart from Bitcointalk, Thank you.The Beer Money Forum is possibly worth a look as well.

comments.author: EmpoEX
comments.body: Quote from: Oukanina on June 28, 2023, 01:44:28 PMThank you, guys. Very helpful.You're welcome. If you are still around after completing the deal, don't forget to let us know if it went smoothly. Be careful because the internet is full of scammers!
